description: This identifies the source of the data when the report of the immunization event is not based on information from the person who administered the vaccine.
name: ImmunizationOrigin

text.div:
ImmunizationOrigin

This identifies the source of the data when the report of the immunization event is not based on information from the person who administered the vaccine.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.4.642.2.0
    CodeDisplay
    providerOther Provider
    recordWriten Record
    recallParent/Guardian/Patient Recall
    schoolSchool Record
